thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. Bancorp CFO Expects 2018 Loan Growth To Pick Up In Second Half Of Year- Conf Call

title: BRIEF-U.S. Bancorp CFO Expects 2018 Loan Growth To Pick Up In Second Half Of Year- Conf Call
text:
April 18, 2018 / 2:05 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. Bancorp CFO Expects 2018 Loan Growth To Pick Up In Second Half Of Year- Conf Call Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - U.S. Bancorp: 
* U.S. BANCORP CFO SAYS EXPECTS 2018 LOAN GROWTH TO PICK UP IN THE SECOND HALF OF THE YEAR - CONF CALL 
* U.S. BANCORP CFO SAYS FOR Q2 EXPECT NET INTEREST INCOME TO INCREASE IN MID-SINGLE DIGIT RANGE - CONF CALL 
* U.S. BANCORP CFO SAYS FOR Q2 EXPECT CREDIT QUALITY TO REMAIN RELATIVELY STABLE COMPARED WITH Q1 - CONF CALL 
* U.S. BANCORP CFO SAYS EXPECTS 2018 EXPENSES TO BE IN HIGHER END OF LONG TERM RANGE - CONF CALL Further company coverage:
